5c2f1830-aafe-4156-8617-76c19bbc9aca.description: This course is intended to provide you with more than just the tools and knowledge that you will need to design a quality online or hybrid course. The course is also intended to provide both you and your students the best opportunity for a successful and rewarding learning experience. It is also designed to create a network of peers who can support one another after the completion of the certification process. Learners who earn this badge submit a course design based on best practices.
5c2f1830-aafe-4156-8617-76c19bbc9aca.name: Alternative Design & Delivery Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Earners submit a final draft of a course based on Quality Matters standards: Course Overview and Introduction Learning Objectives Assessment and Measurement Learning Activities and Learner Interaction Course Technology Learner Support Accessibility and Usability

b859b4d2-6c4f-408d-b72a-d98d743841cf.description: This course will help prepare nursing students at Heartland Community College for Nursing Virtual Reality simulation labs offered through SimX. Completion of this course is the prerequisite to using the Oculus Quest 2 and the SimX software. Students will complete a brief survey at the end of the course to earn this digital badge.
b859b4d2-6c4f-408d-b72a-d98d743841cf.name: Teaching & Learning Commons | Nursing VR with SimX

badge_template_activities.title: Learning Objectives include: 1) Familiarize yourself with the Quest 2 platform 2) Learn how to moderate a sim 3) Understand how to use the SimX app 4) Troubleshoot any issue that may arise while using the Quest 2 5) Apply additional nursing virtual reality applications through the Oculus Quest Store.

705616b8-7116-4844-ad9a-f1b315213061.description: Earners of the Academic English Language Program Completer badge have developed English language skills in reading, writing, listening, and speaking to prepare them for college and career. They can read complex texts, write essays, give speeches, and understand spoken discourse about a variety of topics.
705616b8-7116-4844-ad9a-f1b315213061.name: Adult Education | Academic English Language Program Completer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Academic English Language Program at Heartland Community College. This program includes courses in academic reading, writing, oral communication, math, and college and career readiness for non-native English speakers.

44efaa65-d589-4049-adf0-f49300391358.description: This course will help further your understanding of accessibility. In addition, you will have the opportunity to apply your understanding by making materials accessible with templates and helpful guides. This course was created by the Accessibility Subcommittee of Illinois Community Colleges Online. Some course information was taken from the Breaking Down Barriers Workshop held in 2021 while other information was contributed by each member of the Accessibility Subcommittee.
44efaa65-d589-4049-adf0-f49300391358.name: Illinois Community Colleges Online | ACCESSIBILITY

badge_template_activities.title: This course was created by the Illinois Community Colleges Online (ILCCO) Accessibility Committee. This course is an initiative of ILCCO to create advocacy and awareness in creating a more inclusive culture on higher education campuses across the State of Illinois. In 2021, ILCCO hosted a professional development series entitled "Breaking Down Barriers" which was highly successful. In turn, the Accessibility Committee has used those resources to build this course.

644c2cca-b634-436a-8791-60d118b260ef.description: The mission of the Heartland Community College Adult Education Honor Society is to recognize adult education students and to develop student ambassadors/advocates, mentors and community builders through local volunteering activities/projects. Earners of this badge are recognized as inducted members of the Heartland Community College Adult Education Honor Society.
644c2cca-b634-436a-8791-60d118b260ef.name: Adult Education | Heartland Community College Adult Education Honor Society Member

badge_template_activities.title: Earner met the nomination and induction requirements of Heartland Community College’s Adult Education Honor Society.

f6803dee-4278-4931-b5a2-7fa7d3b1bea0.description: This badge provides acknowledgment of a documented demonstration of global experience and its connection to discipline knowledge

badge_template_activities.title: Requiring at least 1 FA FA3 How to Internationalize Your Curriculum FA2 Learning Across Cultures.

Any other global education experience is at the discretion of CGE. Such as 2-Week Exchange participation. Visiting Liaison Site-Visit participation, Globally focused conference attendance/presentation (IEI, NAFSA, etc), Global Committee/Task Force participation, Teaching INTR 101, 102, or 103 External global education training (e.g. LinkedIn).

dd1fab62-5436-4dcf-a47e-1ddf2e438d97.description: This is part one of a five phase certification program to teach online or hybrid courses at Heartland Community College. For more detailed information consult the syllabus, linked below.
dd1fab62-5436-4dcf-a47e-1ddf2e438d97.name: Instructional Design

badge_template_activities.title: Earners will create a course map, solve an instructional design problem, create a course skeleton in a Canvas sandbox, create a SMART plan for instructional design, create a SMART plan for instructional delivery, and then submit items for evaluation by course instructor.

620dde4c-4289-4f74-820b-a9c4c9d64411.description: This is part three of a five phase certification program to teach online or hybrid courses at Heartland Community College. For more detailed information consult the syllabus, linked below.
620dde4c-4289-4f74-820b-a9c4c9d64411.name: Assessment

badge_template_activities.title: Earners will design an assessment, create an assessment in Canvas, create a rubric for your assessment, create an active learning assessment, create Canvas outcomes for a Canvas assessment, and then submit for evaluation by course instructor.

5ab59853-dfe1-49e6-841a-ca5d502a0bdc.description: This is part two of a five phase certification program to teach online or hybrid courses at Heartland Community College. For more detailed information consult the syllabus, linked below.
5ab59853-dfe1-49e6-841a-ca5d502a0bdc.name: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

badge_template_activities.title: Earners will define UDL, create a SMART goals, create a draft copy of final project, define UDL guidelines, define neurodiversity and neuroplasticity, demonstrate learner-centered design, create final copy of final project, and then submit items for evaluation by course instructor.

d6f2a977-183c-4ca4-9a4e-cd5b50288cd3.description: This course will help further your understanding of accessibility. In addition, you will have the opportunity to apply your understanding by making materials accessible with templates and helpful guides. This course was created by the Accessibility Subcommittee of Illinois Community Colleges Online. The committee is pleased to present this course to higher education partners to increase awareness of accessibility on our campuses.
d6f2a977-183c-4ca4-9a4e-cd5b50288cd3.name: Accessibility

badge_template_activities.title: Identify the laws related to accessibility. Review Illinois Community College Templates for best practice. Compare Universal Design for Learning (UDL) to basic accommodation. Identify and apply at least three strategies to format content using UDL. Locate resources for creating accessible Word, PowerPoint, PDF, and Audio/Visual content. Reflect on your role at your own institution and how you can support accessibility.

5401dff0-e422-4c83-bfc6-c75651f06aec.description: To earn this badge, learners are introduced to 3D printing, Tinkercad, and the various types of 3D printers that Heartland Community College offers. 5401dff0-e422-4c83-bfc6-c75651f06aec.name: Teaching & Learning Commons | 3D Printing

badge_template_activities.title: This is a free Canvas course offered through Heartland Community College and the Teaching and Learning Commons.
